Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel with friendly and helpful staff”

Reviews.Content: husband stayed 3 nights march hotel basic updating value money paris impressions outside tatty dead plants window boxes removed poorly lit improved lights didnt note bed comfy fairly clean staff friendly willing help directions advice looking basic hotel reasonable price hotel

Reviews.Content: spent days hotel du nord march 2012 clean nice parisienne atmosphere location hotel strategic near metro de la republique romantic canal st martin dinner lot nice brasseries owners friendly key everytime price expensive compared located bed comfortable higly recommended

Reviews.Content: stayed partner november fairly adequate decorated lovely hotel nice feel staff helpful welcoming located near bars restaurants plus supermarkets close metro lines easy id recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: average low score little ideal stayed hotel du nord le paris december 5th 7th 2011 10 kilometre walk gare du nord 100 metres metro station jacques bonsergent little republique opposite direction street descript hotel prettiest looking building draped greenery inside hodge podge nick trivia guide books paris french homely feel warmth despite time solid stone floor reception floor elevator bags arrival spiral staircase manageable directly reception hotel noise coming wall elevator shaft warm warm heating notch window whilst indoors bed singles surprisingly snug fit comfortable en suite piece shower bath apart slight department coffee facilities flat screen tele breakfast basement arched stone walls ceilings fitted mish mash furniture breakfast traditionally french 4 pieces bread tea coffee home bit dissapointing true brit morning hotel du nord nice spotlessly clean staff speak english definitely value money spending visit stay wins aside yes
